title: New Danganronpa V3: Minna no Koroshiai Shingakki Comic Anthology
original_name: ニューダンガンロンパ V3 みんなのコロシアイ新学期 コミックアンソロジー
sinopse:
Based on the game of the same title, a variety of authors and artists write a large offering of short stories starring the various characters featured in the game. The stories range from being lovingly heartfelt, packed full of comedy and gags or being downright evil or messed up sometimes!

(Source: MU)
